title: a1534 J4801 , 12inch macbook, trackpad connector,
message:
Came with broken screen, and broken connectors for the trackpad, i can order a new trackpad for cheap, but the J4801 on the board for the trackpad/keyboard i cant find anywhere, is there dead boards for sale?
It still turns on and boots.

Could not find the j4801 connector on the internet, or maybe a dead board?

I think that board is the 820-00045 but i actually cannot see it printed on the board, where do i find the model number?


Can i upload larger than 6mb pictures? JPG for me from the canon 1200d are ususally 7-9mb, i have to resize them all to upload.

title: a1534 J4801 , 12inch macbook, trackpad connector,
message: Same connector as on A1278, A1286, A1398 trackpads.

title: a1534 J4801 , 12inch macbook, trackpad connector,
message:
now i dont have the macbook, i cant check it
are u sure the connector on the motherboard is the same? the trackpad cable is not symmetrical in the a1534, one end of the cable looks different than the other

title: a1534 J4801 , 12inch macbook, trackpad connector,
message:
ok, the macbook came back, i took the connector from a dead a1278 trackpad, it fits on the a1534 board
I ordered the trackpad, cause the connector is damaged on that too, but can i fix that with something? so the a1534 trackpad, it has 2 larger connectors, im looking for the one which goes to the motherboard.

title: a1534 J4801 , 12inch macbook, trackpad connector,
message: You can solder to the trackpad without destroying it, just get a new one.

title: a1534 J4801 , 12inch macbook, trackpad connector,
message: i mean the connectors on the trackpad are different, i cant use the connector from a1278.

title: a1534 J4801 , 12inch macbook, trackpad connector,
message: And I mean that you should not even attempt to fix a cheap trackpad.

title: a1534 J4801 , 12inch macbook, trackpad connector,
message: I ordered another one, but why would not i try to fix it, i fixed some DC board for macbook air too, that is cheap too, but we cant have anything in stock, usually for us takes at least 1 week until part arrives, if its easy i rather fix.
